cristal-den/bibins-sabotage-delivery.title: Bibin's Personal Pony Express
cristal-den/bibins-sabotage-delivery.description: Bibin asked you to deliver a suitcase to Mighty Hobo, the water carrier of Hillburrow. As tempting as it may be, he insisted you should not open the suitcase.
cristal-den/bibins-sabotage-delivery.password: Get the password from Mighty Hobo
